column1: 24939707,s1,T2,T3,BACKGROUND: ,Organic solute carrier partner 1, (,OSCP1,) is known to facilitate the transport of various organic solutes into cells and reported to play a role in cell growth and cell differentiation.,Not_a_complex
24939707,s4,T6,T7,RESULTS: Drosophila contains a single orthologue of ,OSCP1, (,dOSCP1,) that shares 58% homology with its human counterpart.,Not_a_complex
